data.price: 67. Улар инфоқ-эҳсон қилган вақтларида исроф ҳам, хасислик ҳам қилмаслар (балки эҳсонлари) ана ўша (хасислик билан исрофнинг) ўртасида — мўътадил бўлур.
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُواْ لَمۡ يُسۡرِفُواْ وَلَمۡ يَقۡتُرُواْ وَكَانَ بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامٗا

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā anfaqū lam yus'rifū walam yaqturū wakāna bayna dhālika qawāman

dua.name: Dua for Balanced Living
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance in maintaining balance between spiritual devotion and worldly responsibilities, advocating a moderate lifestyle.

version.title: Uzbek translation - Alauddin Mansour
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uzbek by Alauddin Mansour, printed in 1430 H. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
